name: Solar Struggle (itch)
description:
In the puzzle-platformer game Solar Struggle a lone kitten momma has lost its baby! Take on the role as the robot S.P.O.R.T. (Solar Powered Off-Road Tracker) and traverse a gloomy town level; its different obstacles & bring the baby kitten back to its worried parent. All while managing your solar powered energy-level!

Can be played with either keyboard or Xbox-Controller.
Credits Tristan Berglund | Emma Brannefalk | Filip Ekström | William Isacsson | Cosmo Jenefors | Sergei Maltcev | Fredrik Modin | Bianca Nilsson Hedenberg | Max Pålsson
